## ContextEvent type

Events emitted by a context

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContextEvent = {
    context: Context;
    binding: Readonly<Binding<unknown>>;
    type: string;
};
```
**References:** [Context](./context.context.md)<!-- -->, [Binding](./context.binding.md)
